TopicTitle: Orbit does not change with engine running in time warp

Articles.Content:
Steps to replicate: Put a rocket in orbit. Time warp at 1x. Thorttle up the engine. Watch the orbit change in map view. Increase time warp. The orbit stops changing. The fuel remaining continues to decrease, i.e. an effective Isp efficiency of zero.

The bug seems to appear arbitarily, so far happening in 3 of 4 sessions.


KSP Version: Early Access, Feb 24
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU: i5-4690K
GPU: GeForce GTX 970
Workaround: Do not use time warp and thrust at the same time
Mods: PhysicsSettings.jsons edit to reduce joint wobble
